price: 28. (Mûssa) alobi: Nkolo wa moniele na eloli, na manso maye mazali otei na yango mibale. Soki bozali koyeba.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi wamā baynahumā in kuntum taʿqilūna
